name: sonarqube_get_metrics
description: Get metrics for a SonarQube project

metrics.description: List of metric keys to retrieve (optional)

name: sonarqube_get_issues
description: Get issues for a SonarQube project

severities.description: List of issue severities to filter by (optional)

types.description: List of issue types to filter by (optional)

statuses.description: List of issue statuses to filter by (e.g., OPEN, CONFIRMED, RESOLVED, CLOSED) (optional)

impact_severities.description: List of impact severities to filter by (e.g., HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW) (optional)

impact_software_qualities.description: List of software qualities to filter by (e.g., MAINTAINABILITY, RELIABILITY, SECURITY) (optional)

name: sonarqube_get_quality_gate
description: Get quality gate status for a SonarQube project

organization.description: Organization key (required for SonarCloud and some SonarQube instances)
